mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM chat_sessions WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_sessions ( id, user_id, title, first_message, model, message_count, last_message_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{firstMessage}, #{model}, #{messageCount}, #{lastMessageAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_sessions SET message_count = #{messageCount}, last_message_at = #{lastMessageAt}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
